title: Tutorial
body:
Hey my human controller! I am Di, warrior in training!

[[Answer:Huh?|Tutorial2]]

title: Tutorial2
body:
Let me walk you through managing my training.

 [[Answer:Continue|Tutorial3]]

title: Tutorial3
body:
Over here is my training actions. Click start on any of them to toggle them on. Be warned however, as I can only currently do 1 at a time.

 [[Answer:Ok|Tutorial4]]

title: Tutorial4
body:
Days is this number over here on the left. Every time it goes up, I gain strength based on the effects of the active actions.

 [[Answer:I see|Tutorial5]]

title: Tutorial5
body:
Over in the middle is the days left until my first fight. Make sure I'm stronger than the enemy by then!

 [[Answer:Okay|Tutorial6]]

title: Tutorial6
body:
My neighbor, Shu from Accounting challenged me to a duel. I have no idea why she would when she's not a warrior, but I never back down from a fight!

 [[Answer:O|Tutorial7]]

title: Tutorial7
body:
Let's become the strongest in this world together!

 [[Answer:Ye|Tutorial8]]

title: Loss0
body: Kuh... You have bested me... bested me with your blade. [[Answer:Loss01|Loss01]]

title: Loss01
body: Right, I figured it wouldn't be too hard to win. Your lack of talent has always betrayed you. [[Answer:Loss02|Loss02]]

title: Loss02
body: But worry not, I have found a capable helper. Our next fight shall not be so easy! [[Answer:Loss03|Loss03]]

title: Loss03
body: Next? What? No, you die here. I can't die so soon so it has to be you. [[Answer:Loss04|Loss04]]

title: Loss04
body: ...Huh? [[Answer:Loss05|Loss05]]

title: Loss05
body: Don't resent me too harshly. [[Answer:Loss06|Loss06]]

title: Loss1
body: This chicken... too much... [[Answer:Loss11|Loss11]]

title: Loss11
body: You were a worthy challenger, but you failed to properly take care of your hunger, and thus you have fallen. [[Answer:Loss12|Loss12]]

title: Loss12
body: Are you going to kill me too? [[Answer:Loss13|Loss13]]

title: Loss13
body: Of course. [[Answer:Loss14|Loss14]]

title: Loss14
body: Why? There's no reason to go this far. [[Answer:Loss15|Loss15]]

title: Loss15
body: You don't know? Then allow me to enlighten you. We must follow the mandate of Heaven's will, delivered to us by the Son of Heaven. To kill as many mortals as we can for a chance to be spared Heaven's wrath. [[Answer:Lose16|Lose16]]

title: Lose16
body: You're telling me that the reason everyone around me is embroiled in war is for such a dumb reason? [[Answer:Lose17|Lose17]]

title: Lose17
body: To go against the will of the heavens is to court death, and I'm not quite ready to pass on. Goodbye, Di. [[Answer:Lose18|Lose18]]

title: Loss2
body: Wait wait wait, stop! [[Answer:Loss21|Loss21]]

title: Loss21
body: Huh? What is it, I have to k-kill you now.[[Answer:Loss21|Loss22]]

title: Loss22
body: But we don't have to! If we just join together, surely we can defy the heavens and survive together![[Answer:Loss21|Loss23]]

title: Loss23
body: No way, there's no way. I'm nowhere near strong enough. Maybe if I was a hundred, no, a thousand times stronger I could have... maybe I... no, there's no point thinking.[[Answer:Loss21|Loss24]]

title: Loss24
body: What if I was a hundred times stronger than I was now? Would you believe I could overthrow the heavens?[[Answer:Loss21|Loss25]]

title: Loss25
body: I-I guess? Not that it matters. We're all weak, and we're all doomed. I'm probably coming after you anyway, so just return to the cycle of reincarnation quietly!

title: Loss3
body: Ugh, forget it. Just finish me off already. [[Answer:Loss31|Loss31]]

title: Loss31
body: You seem... oddly calm for someone about to lose their life.[[Answer:Loss31|Loss32]]

title: Loss32
body: What does it matter what I tell you? You'll forget the next time I come here anyway.[[Answer:Loss31|Loss33]]

title: Loss33
body: Next time huh... do you possibly know something greater about this mandate of heaven?[[Answer:Loss31|Loss34]]

title: Loss34
body: I know about as much as you do, but the next time I fight you, I'll cut you down and reach this Son of Heaven. Then maybe there I'll figure out how to split apart the heavens.[[Answer:Loss31|Loss35]]

title: Loss35
body: Your life still belongs to me, but if what you say about having multiple chances is true, then perhaps I can give you a gift to take along the way.[[Answer:Loss31|Loss36]]

title: Loss36
body: Hm, what's that? I can't take any items with me, except these coins for some reason. If you want to give me anything, maybe you can give me more time to train.[[Answer:Loss31|Loss37]]

title: Loss37
body: I can't do that, you may be trying to trick me and escape. No, instead I'll teach you part of my swordsmanship. If you meet me in another life a thousand times stronger, then I'll teach you the whole thing. Until then, goodbye.[[Answer:Loss31|Loss38]]

title: Loss4
body:
Those talismans are pretty tricky, ya gotta teach me how to use them.
 [[Answer:Loss41|Loss41]]

title: Loss41
body:
Enough talk you murderous slime! This is the end for you!
 [[Answer:Loss42|Loss42]]

title: Loss42
body: Ugh, getting your skills are going to be tough huh. Well whatever, its nothing a little strength can't fix. See you next time. [[Answer:Loss43|Loss43]]

title: Loss5
body: And so ends your tale, you upstart mortal. Your efforts to struggle against the flow are futile. Join your fallen comrades in death's embrace. [[Answer:Loss51|Loss51]]

title: Loss51
body: Piece of shit... what even is the point of all this, this mandate, this killing. [[Answer:Loss52|Loss52]]

title: Loss52
body: I merely execute heaven's will. There's no need to question what's beyond you. You lived longer than most ant, and be grateful, for you strength has bought you that time. [[Answer:Loss53|Loss53]]

title: Loss53
body: Unacceptable answer, unacceptable world. I won't stand for this. Next time, next time you will fall. [[Answer:Loss54|Loss54]]

title: Loss54
body: Ha! Good luck with that, killer star. [[Answer:Loss55|Loss55]]

title: Win1
body: You see it right? You have no chance of victory, not even if you train for 100 years.

title: Win11
body: Yeah. I get it. Looks like I'll be the first one on out. Just end things here.

title: Win12
body: No. I won't. I have no intention of letting things continue like this. If the heavens will our deaths, then I will sever the heavens.

title: Win13
body: I would've thought you were full of nonsense, but... To get from your powerless state to heights of strength I can't comprehend... I hope I can put my faith in you, because if you fail, we're bought bound for and eternal suffering worse than death.
